Troubleshooting
---------------

If you encounter errors regarding the matplotlib backend, you may need to install the following packages:

.. code-block:: shell

    sudo apt-get update
    sudo apt-get install -y libegl1-mesa libxkbcommon-x11-0

If version conflicts occur, make sure you use a clean Python environment with Python 3.11 (higher versions are not tested and may lead to errors):

.. code-block:: shell

    conda create -n comet python==3.11
    conda activate comet
